parameters.name: api_data
parameters.value: {'name': '【普通考试】——新增考试-添加试卷-试题组卷-新增试题-新增判断题', 'request': {'url': 'api/v1/exam/question/other', 'method': 'POST', 'headers': {'Authorization': 'Bearer__${admin_token}', 'uri': 'exam/question-depot', 'content-type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8'}, 'data': {'value': [{'value': '1', 'name': '1', 'type': 3}], 'content': "【判断题】试题信息$date_time{}", 'contentText': "【判断题】试题信息$date_time{}", 'questionAttrs[0][value]': 1, 'questionAttrs[0][name]': 1, 'questionAttrs[0][type]': 3, 'score': 1000, 'type': 3, 'questionDepotId': '${questionDepotId}', 'questionDepot[id]': '${questionDepotId}', 'questionDepot[name]': '${questionDepotName}', 'organizationId': '${organizationId}', 'organization[id]': '${organizationId}', 'organization[name]': '${organizationName}', 'parsing': '【判断题】试题解析', 'parsingText': '【判断题】试题解析', 'difficulty': 3, 'isTemp': 1, 'depotEdit': 0}}, 'extract': {'panduantiId': '$.id', 'panduantiName': '$.content', 'panduantiDifficulty': '$.difficulty'}, 'validate': [{'eq': ['$.type', '3']}], 'allure': {'allure_descrption': '【普通考试】——新增考试-添加试卷-试题组卷-新增试题-新增判断题', 'allure_suite': '管理端', 'allure_sub_suite': '考试模块', 'allure_feature': '管理端', 'allure_story': '考试模块'}}
